Must read: The 82nd Airborne live-tweeted D-Day as it happened 74 years ago. Very interesting. Thank you @82ndABNDiv for keeping these stories alive. #AADDayReenactment https://twitter.com/82ndABNDiv/status/1004392535748423681 QT @82ndABNDiv So that's it, folks.  The story does not end there, but we do.  This was a glimpse into 17 hours that would impact the Free World.

What a story.  What a remarkable time.  What a group of men.  What a Nation we live in to have them.

Thank you all so much.
